## Row {height=50%}

# Plots

## Row {height="75%"}

### Column {width="75%"}
```{r}
#| title: Penguins mass by flipper length
ggplot(data=penguins)+
  geom_point( mapping=aes(x=body_mass_g, y=flipper_length_mm, color=species))+
  labs(title="Body Mass By Flipper Length", x="Mass (g)", y="Flipper Length (mm)")



```

## Row {height="25%"}
```{r}


penguins |>
  group_by(island) |>
  summarize(AvgMass=mean(body_mass_g, na.rm=TRUE)) |>
  gt()
  


```
